txt.en: This is a piece of the torso of the statue of Helgi Goblinbane that once stood outside of the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\nThe goblins of Durin's Way destroyed the statue, and its parts can be found scattered throughout Moria. A dwarf named Uxi endeavours to reassemble this statue.

'I have heard of the dwarf Uxi's endeavour to reassemble Helgi Goblinbane's great statue! So the statue's torso was nearly lost to the flooded depths? I am glad you came when you did.\n\n'It seems like the water rises daily. Before long, the statue might have been lost to history. I will send this piece along to the Chamber of the Cross-roads.'
You have discovered the torso of the statue of Helgi Goblinbane.
Talk to Águti in the Rotting Cellar
Águti is at the Rotting Cellar to the north.\n\nÁguti will want to know you found a piece of the shattered statue.
Talk to Águti in the Rotting Cellar
Águti is in the Rotting Cellar.\n\nÁguti will want to know you found the final piece of the shattered statue.
